articles.content: Florida Gators basketball star Keyontae Johnson addressed the public on Friday for the first time since he collapsed during a game last Saturday. In a brief video statement, Johnson thanked his fans … [+1782 chars]

articles.title: WE HAVE A SEASON! NHL-NHLPA Tentatively Agree to 56-Game Season - Pittsburgh Hockey Now
articles.description: The final details may be sketchy and even the location of the Canadian teams may be a work in progress, but the NHL and NHLPA have reached an agreement on a 56-game 2020-21 NHL season, according to multiple reports from Sportsnet and TSN, which are the NHL’s …
